448x448.quote: vit_base_patch16_224 - A: img_size = 448 x 448... vit_base_patch16_224 - B: img_size = 448 x 448

horizontalflip.quote: return Compose([RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2()])

randomresizedcrop.quote: return Compose([RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2()])

shiftscalerotate.quote: return Compose([RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2()])

transpose.quote: return Compose([RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2()])

tta.quote: vit_base_patch16_384: 5x TTA... vit_base_patch16_224 - A: 5x TTA... vit_base_patch16_224 - B: 5x TTA

verticalflip.quote: return Compose([RandomResizedCrop(img_size, img_size), Transpose(p=0.5), HorizontalFlip(p=0.5), VerticalFlip(p=0.5), ShiftScaleRotate(p=0.5), Normalize(mean=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5], std=[0.5, 0.5, 0.5]), ToTensorV2()])

vit-b/16.quote: My final submission is ensemble of three ViT models... vit_base_patch16_384... vit_base_patch16_224

cross-entropy-with-label-smoothing.quote: self.criterion = CrossEntropyLoss().to(self.device) if not self.config.label_smooth else CrossEntropyLossWithLabelSmooth(epsilon=self.config.label_smooth_alpha).to(self.device)

crossentropyloss.quote: from torch.nn import CrossEntropyLoss... self.criterion = CrossEntropyLoss().to(self.device) if not self.config.label_smooth else CrossEntropyLossWithLabelSmooth(epsilon=self.config.label_smooth_alpha).to(self.device)

adam.quote: from torch.optim import Adam... self.optimizer = Adam(self.model.parameters(), lr=self.settings.LR)

lambdalr.quote: LR Scheduler: LambdaLR, self.scheduler = LambdaLR(self.optimizer, lr_lambda=lambda epoch: 1.0 / (1.0 + epoch))

multi-dropout.quote: To adapt vit_base_patch_224(expected image size is 224 x 224) for 448 x 448 image, after augmentation, divide it into four parts and input each image into the model. And then, they are adapted the weighted average using calculated weights at attention layer, and finally output prediction using Multi-Dropout Linear.

5-fold-stratified.quote: 5fold StratifiedKFold... if self.settings.KFOLD == "StratifiedKFold": skf = StratifiedKFold(n_splits=self.settings.N_SPLITS, shuffle=True, random_state=self.settings.SEED)

linear-layer.quote: vit_base_patch16_384's final layer is not multi-drop but simple linear... output prediction using Multi-Dropout Linear

dropout_rate.quote: self.model = myModel(arch_name=self.config.arch_name, pretrained=True, img_size=self.config.image_size, multi_drop=self.config.multi_dropout, multi_drop_rate=0.5, att_layer=self.config.att_layer, att_pattern=self.config.att_pattern)

weighted-arithmetic-mean.quote: Weighted Averaging... they are adapted the weighted average using calculated weights at attention layer

5x-tta.quote: vit_base_patch16_384: 5x TTA... vit_base_patch16_224 - A: 5x TTA... vit_base_patch16_224 - B: 5x TTA

multi-crop.quote: To adapt vit_base_patch_224(expected image size is 224 x 224) for 448 x 448 image, after augmentation, divide it into four parts and input each image into the model

pytorch.quote: import torch, import torch.nn as nn, from torch.optim import Adam, from torch.nn import CrossEntropyLoss

albumentations.quote: from albumentations import (Compose, Normalize, Resize, RandomResizedCrop, HorizontalFlip, VerticalFlip, ShiftScaleRotate, Transpose)
